Basic support
.
[C]Do, a deer, a female deer\
[Dm]Ray, a drop of golden sun
.
<p><span class="chord"><span class="inner"><i class="name">C</i></span></span>Do, a deer, a female deer<br />
<span class="chord"><span class="inner"><i class="name">Dm</i></span></span>Ray, a drop of golden sun</p>
.

Flats and Sharps
.
[Eb]May, a possi[D#]bility
.
<p><span class="chord"><span class="inner"><i class="name">E♭</i></span></span>May, a possi<span class="chord"><span class="inner"><i class="name">D♯</i></span></span>bility</p>
.

Bass notes
.
[D/F#]Fee, the price you pay to run
.
<p><span class="chord"><span class="inner"><i class="name">D/F♯</i></span></span>Fee, the price you pay to run</p>
.

Color chords and different notations (sing in half-time, bossanova guitar rhythm)
.
[CΔ913]So, — I'd [C6]like to see Bra[Fmaj9]zil . . . . .[F6(9)]\
[E-7b13]La, — I'd [CM7sus2]really like to [E9]go . . .[E7b9]\
[AmΔ7/9]Tea, — I [A-7]sit and sip so [D#ø7]slow . . .[D#o7]
.

Diagrams
.

<p>That will <span class="chord"><span class="inner"><i class="name">Dm<sup>7</sup></i><i class="diagram"> 5fr<br />  ̶● ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶<br /> ‖̶ ̶|̶●|̶ ̶|̶<br /> ‖̶●|̶ ̶|̶ ̶|̶<br /> ‖̶ ̶|̶ ̶|̶●|̶<br /> ‖̶●|̶ ̶|̶ ̶|̶<br />x ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶<br /></i></span></span>bring — <span class="chord"><span class="inner"><i class="name">F<sup>6</sup><sup>(9)</sup></i><i class="diagram"> 7fr<br />  ̶ ̶ ̶● ̶ ̶ ̶<br /> ‖̶ ̶|̶●|̶ ̶|̶<br /> ‖̶●|̶ ̶|̶ ̶|̶<br /> ‖̶●|̶ ̶|̶ ̶|̶<br /> ‖̶ ̶|̶●|̶ ̶|̶<br />x ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶<br /></i></span></span>us —— <span class="chord"><span class="inner"><i class="name">Em<sup>7</sup></i><i class="diagram"> 7fr<br />  ̶● ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶<br /> ‖̶ ̶|̶●|̶ ̶|̶<br /> ‖̶●|̶ ̶|̶ ̶|̶<br /> ‖̶ ̶|̶ ̶|̶●|̶<br /> ‖̶●|̶ ̶|̶ ̶|̶<br />x ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶<br /></i></span></span>back — <span class="chord"><span class="inner"><i class="name">G<sup>13</sup></i><i class="diagram"> 10fr<br />  ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶● ̶<br /> ‖̶ ̶|̶ ̶|̶●|̶<br /> ‖̶ ̶|̶ ̶|̶●|̶<br />x‖̶ ̶|̶ ̶|̶ ̶|̶<br /> ‖̶●|̶ ̶|̶ ̶|̶<br />x ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶<br /></i></span></span>to —— <span class="chord diagram"><span class="inner"><i class="diagram"> 7fr<br />  ̶● ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶<br /> ‖̶ ̶|̶●|̶ ̶|̶<br /> ‖̶ ̶|̶ ̶|̶●|̶<br />x‖̶ ̶|̶ ̶|̶ ̶|̶<br />x‖̶ ̶|̶ ̶|̶ ̶|̶<br />  ̶ ̶ ̶● ̶ ̶ ̶<br /></i></span></span>Do . . . .<span class="chord diagram"><span class="inner"><i class="diagram"> 8fr<br />x ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶<br /> ‖̶ ̶|̶ ̶|̶●|̶<br /> ‖̶ ̶|̶●|̶ ̶|̶<br /> ‖̶ ̶|̶ ̶|̶●|̶<br /> ‖̶ ̶|̶ ̶|̶○|̶<br />  ̶● ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶ ̶<br /></i></span></span></p>
.

EDGE CASES

Don't capo if a chord diagram is within the first four frets
.
[(3)32010]Cmaj (`[(3)32010]`) ,
[x43444]D♭<sup>9</sup> (`[x43444]`) ,
[x54555]D<sup>9</sup> (`[x54555]`) ,
[8,(10),10,9,10,x]C6 (`[8,(10),10,9,10,x]`)
.
